1.content: Wonrei and Li-en were living in peace in Hong Kong while three evil mamodo were walking the earth with their book owners. They knew that they were going to have to fight them sooner or later and they had both agreed that the battle for the mamodo crown will end now. Wonrei, who has gained the ability to sense the energies of other mamodo has detected a strong energy source from Canada. Li-en and Wonrei boarded the nect plane to Canada and prepared for their next fight. (Once the fight for the crown is over, the winner will get one wish. Wonrei's secret wish is to stay with Li-en forever.)
1.title: The beginning

11.content:
Once they arrived in Canada, they were quickly greeted by their first opponent. He was an ice type mamodo and was about 8 feet tall. His name was Frostra. His partner went by Drake. "Good evening Wonrei. My name is Frostra and I will be the last mamodo you will ever face."
"And why is that Frostra?"
"Because Wonrei, I am going to kill you here and now! Drake you know which spell to cast!"
*Gio-Freezo-ruk*
Frostra grew spikes all over his body and they continued to grow larger until they burst off of him and flew in every direction.
"Li-en!" Wonrei quickly jumped in front of Li-en as she cast a spell.
*Rerudo*
A Thin emerald colored wall appeared in front of Wonrei's hands, protecting both of them.
"Grr, nice spell Wonrei but my anger towards you is stronger than any shiled you may have."
*Gigano-Freezaruga*
A Giant beam of ice was fired directly at Wonrei and encased him in a block of ice. "Haha! Now to burn your book and then to assign work for your little girl friend here. Maybe she would be a good slave to clean my castle. Top to bottom every day."
Wonrei then broke free from the ice after hearing what Frostra had in store for Li-en. "You shall not touch Li-en."
Wonrei began to glow with a redish color and his energy spiked greatly.
"Uhh, Drake use my armor spell now!"
*Gigano-amuruk*
Frostra then grew an extra plate of armor on top of his skin.

Why does this Mamodo hate Wonrei so much? How will this battle turn out? Stay tuned for the next addition and find out.
11.title: Their first fight

choices: Wonrei talks to Frostra before his book gets burnt
111.content:
"Fellow mamodo, I have one question before we resume fighting. Why do you hate me?"

"Because, back in the mamodo world I encountered a beautiful girl. She was the most beautiful mamodo girl you could ever imagine. But when I finally got the courage to talk to her, you talked to her first and she liked you."

"I apologize Frostra, but I do not recall this ever happening. Do you happen to know her name?"

"Yes her name is Lin. She has long black hair and is about your height."

"Oh I apologize Frostra. You see Lin is my half sister. She wasn't selected for this battle. We were probably just talking and you had the wrong idea. I apologize if there was any confusion."

"No you lie, I know she isn't your sister. It can't be true. You're lying. I will defeat you here and now and then show Lin who she should fall in love with."

"No. Anyone who has to deal with violence to get what they want, will not be allowed to be with my dear half sister." Not only by my choice but by hers as well. She doesn't like to fight and will never go out with a monster like you. All you think of is power but I and my friends rely on inner strength and eachother to help each other with our goals and dreams."

"Shut up! I will go out with her, related to you or not. I am not fighting just for me, I am fighting because I want to be the one to protect her!"
*Go Boren*
Wonrei releashed a furious blow to Frostra's stomach, cracking his armor in the process.
"No I will not fail against you Wonrei!"
*Lagikor Fang*
A giant wolf figure appeared in front of Frostra and lunged toward Wonrei.
*Rerudo*
The shield broke and Wonrei was badly injured.
"Li-en, I fear if this battle is to go on much longer you will get hurt. Please use our two spell combo to defeat this mamodo once and for all."
"Right Wonrei"
*Redoruk*
Wonrei lunged towards Frostra at light speed.
"Now Li-en!"
*Ganzu Boren*
Wonrei dealt 36 blows to his opponents stomach where the armor had broken.
Frostra soon fell and lie helplessly on the ground.
111.title: The conclusion

1111.content:
"Frostra, you are indeed a powerful opponent but as my previous statement stands, you won't ever get the chance to become friends with Lin."
Frostra began to breathe heavily after hearing the devastating words come from Wonrei's mouth.
"But... if you change who you are on the inside... Lin may come to like you and we could become friends in the other world."
"Wonrei... you truly are a force to be reckoned with. How is it that someone so strong can be so kind as well?"

"It's because my goal is to become a king that will protect others. If anyone ever needs help, I will be there to help by any means."

"Thank you Wonrei. I will try to improve myself to fit your expectations."

"No. I do not have any expectations for you. I only want you to make yourself happier, and if making Lin like you makes you happy, then do whatever you need to."

"Understood Wonrei. I am ready to go back to the other world now. Good luck with the rest of your battles Wonrei."

Moments later Frostra's book was burnt and he returned to the mamodo world. It was time for Li-en and Wonrei to go to their next location... New York City...
1111.title: The talk

choices: X-31 readies his spell towards Li-en
11111.content:
This chapter will take place on an air plane.

"Li-en, would you like the last of my dessert?"

"No thank you Wonrei, I'm already stuffed from that lobster."

Wonrei laughed gently as he gazed upon Li-en's beautiful face. It was then at that time that he began to think of when they first fell in love.

It was at Li-en's grand parents farm. They had gone to there to escape the clutches of Li-en's Mafia ruling Father. It was also the time when Li-en first began to train Wonrei the art of Kung fu.

The plane had hit some turbulence. The plane's violent shaking rudely awakened Wonrei from his day dream. Moments later it had happened again but it was stronger than before. Suddenly the pilot spoke over the loud speaker.

"Attention passengers, we are having a slight problem with turbulence so please bare with us and fasten your seatbelts."

"I have a bad feeling about this Wonrei."

"I too feel something strange going on."

Wonrei suddenly heard a strange chant and looked around trying to find out where it had come from.

"Wonrei, what is it? Did you hear something?"

"Yes... I think it was a spell."



Meanwhile, at the back of the plane in the rest room, a book owner was casting spells over and over.
"Ha ha ha. Not only will I get revenge on the pilot that ruined me but I will defeat a mamodo as well. I, Vladimir along with my mamodo X-31, I will take my revenge on anyone and anything that stands in my way!"

The silent robotic like mamodo waited inside one of the over head compartments where the luggage went. He silently applied Extra weight by teleporting boulders into the engines of the plane. Vladimir's plan was to make the plane crash and then use X-31's ability to fly to get away.

Back to Li-en and Wonrei...

"Where is he?" Shouted Li-en.

"I don't know Li-en, he must be here somewhere." Wonrei closed his eyes and focused on every sound going on in the plane. Within a few moments he heard where the spell chanting was coming from.
"Li-en the restroom!"

Li-en smashed the door open and caught the book owner red handed.

"So you finally caught me eh? No matter my mamodo has enough power to defeat you in a normal battle. X-31, come on out!"
"Affirmative." X-31 dropped out of the over head compartment and focused on Li-en's position.

"Grandsen!"
11111.title: First class leads to the second fight

111111.content:
"Grandsen"
Three cannons appeared in front of X31. They quickly fired boulders towards Li-en.
"Li-en! Cast the spell now!"
"Rerudo!"
An emerald shield appeared in front of Wonrei's palms as he jumped on front of Li-en.
"Nice little shield weaklings. But lets see you block this! Ground Garudo!"
Spikes erupted from the floor and struck Wonrei and scratched Li-en.
111111.title: X-31 readies his spell towards Li-en

1111111.content:
"Now lets finish this once and for all. Gigano Groundsen!"
A Large cannon erupted from the floor and took aim at Wonrei and Li-en.

"Li-en, cast the spell now!"
"Right. Go Boren!"
Wonrei's fist began to glow as he punched the gigantic boulder that was fired from the cannon. The boulder split in two and fell to the floor.
"Li-en, we cannot allow these innocent people to get hurt. We must take this battle somewhere else."
"I already have a plan for that Wonrei. Gar Redoruk!"
Wonrei launched an upper cut with his leg and knocked both X-31 and Vladimir through the roof of the plane. Wonrei and Li-en jumped through the hole they made and looked around for their opponents. They were no where to be found. From somewhere far away they heard a spell being cast.
"Ganzu Grand Bao!"

Three giant snakes crawled out from underneath the plane and lunged at Wonrei.
"Li-en!"
"Ganzu Boren!"
Wonrei fired dozens of punches at the snakes and knocked them away with ease.

The match seemed to be at a stalemate. Both teams waiting for the other to make a move. Meanwhile, the plane was starting to head into a thunderstorm.
1111111.title: Fire!

choices: Wonrei finds new power within himself
11111111.content:
As the plane went into the storm both teams remained still, waiting for the other side to make a move.
"I've had enough of this. X-31 get ready. Ground Garudo!"
"You won't hit me with the smae trick twice!" said Li-en.
"Go Wonrei, Redoruk!" Wonrei swiftly ran towards X-31 with an amazing speed.
"Claydo!"
The ground under Wonrei turned to quick sand and Wonrei soon sunk back to the inside of the plane.
"Now that your partner is unprotected... Grandsen!"
X-31 shot 3 large boulders towards Li-en. Alone and helpless, Li-en was too scared to move. "Wonrei!"
Wonrei burst through the roof of the plane and blocked the boulders with his body. Wonrei was out cold and unable to battle.
11111111.title: The end of the kung fu team?

info.brief_description: Wonrei and Li-en's ultimate mission. Fight the last 3 mamodo to become the mamodo king.
info.description: The remaing four mamodo on earth are the only things stadning in Wonrei's way of becoming the mamodo king. With Li-en's help, it just might be possible for his dream to come true.
info.pretty_title: The final mission for Wonrei and Li-en
